name: AbortError
message: The job posting has already been applied to the candidate's tracker

experience.title: Regional Manager
experience.description:
- Winner of 3 straight “Best Salesman in Pennsylvania” awards
- Promoted to manager of Scranton Branch after 5 successful years in sales
- Increased glossy stock paper sales by 75% over a one month period
- Collected approximately half of Dunder Mifflin-Scranton’s clients while in sales and as manager
- Consistently outperformed other Dunder Mifflin branches in revenue and total sales

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description:
Designed, developed, implemented and tested new software solutions for internal and external partners using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP, contributing to the successful completion of a major organizational project
Developed extensive technical documentation to accurately and clearly explain new and existing software applications
Assisted both colleagues and end-users with their technical inquiries, helping them to understand complex system architectures, perform troubleshooting and debugging

experience.title: President
experience.description:
- Took brief hiatus from Dunder Mifflin to create paper company; was bought out in multi-million dollar deal
- Outperformed local paper company, Dunder Mifflin, in sales by 80% over one month period
- Collected 90% of Michael Scott Paper Company client base
- Claimed 33% of Dunder Mifflin’s client base by offering lower prices and better service

experience.title: Sales Representative
experience.description:
- Became known as office expert on cinema and pop culture; was encouraged to write screenplays
- Developed excellent working relationships with coworkers; including top sales person Vikram
- Fostered a friendly environment throughout the office

experience.title: Customer Service Consultant
experience.description:
- Greeted customers and informed them of specials on products including khaki pants; increasing khaki pants revenue by 60%
- Lead all Men’s Wearhouse stores in sales from 1989-1990
- Promoted to assistant manager after 3 months of employment
